text: Wone hamganile kumkolela mijito Mkulu Nguluwi, lelo mhagule lehano baha ndo whaani yomumkolela mijito, kota ndo milungu jila jiwele wasekulu wa hemwe nawajikolela mijito kumwambu mwa lwanda lwa Eyufulate ama milungu ja Waamoli jiwele sambi mwangikala kuli isi ya hewo. Ila heni na ng'handa ya heni, tomkolela mijito Mkulu Nguluwi.‚Äù
